snippet.title: S.C.I.M.M.A.R.'S (Apple II - Avalon Hill)
snippet.description:
S.C.I.M.M.A.R.'S (http://www.elisoftware.org/index.php?title=S.C.I.M.M.A.R.%27s_(Apple_II,_5_1/4%22_Disk)_Avalon_Hill_-_1983_USA,_Canada_Release) was one of the few action games from Avalon Hill, published in 1983 for the Apple ][. S.C.I.M.M.A.R. stands for Surface Contragrav Individual Manned Mobile Antivechicle Raider, a vehicle used by the player to defeat enemies on the planet Trulgren 1.

Credits:
Cover art - www.elisoftware.org
